property.name: Traits
property.value: Rohan. Warrior. Scout.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each Ê hero with an attached Mount gets +1 Ò. Each Ï hero with an attached Mount gets +1 Û. Each Ì hero with an attached Mount gets +1 Ú.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Rohan. Scout.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Spend 1 Ê resource to ready Ceorl. Then, you may give control of Ceorl to another player. Any player may trigger this action. (Limit once per phase).

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Attach to a Ì or sentinel hero. Restricted.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After attached hero defends against an attack, exhaust Armored Destrier to ready attached hero. Then, discard a shadow card from another enemy engaged with the defending player.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Rohan. Warrior.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: While Déorwine is defending, spend 1 Ì resource to cancel a shadow effect dealt to the attacking enemy. Any player may trigger this action.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Play only if you control a Noldor hero.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Choose a non-unique enemy. Until the end of the phase, treat the chosen enemy’s printed text box as if it were blank (except for Traits).

property.name: Traits
property.value: Dale. Scout.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After Rhovanion Outrider commits to the quest, place 1 progress on a location in the staging area. If that location is not explored by this effect, give Rhovanion Outrider +1 Ò until the end of the phase.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Play only after the staging step.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you commit characters to the quest, if each character you have committed to the quest is a Scout, each of those characters gets +2 Ò until the end of the phase.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Play Entangling Nets into the staging area unattached.

property.name: Text
property.value: If unattached, attach Entangling Nets to the next eligible enemy that enters the staging area. Attached enemy gets –2 Û and –2 Ú.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Play only after making engagement checks.

property.name: Text
property.value: Encounter Action: If no enemies were engaged this phase, deal 1 damage to each enemy in the staging area. Then, the players as a group may spend 3 Ï resources to deal 2 additional damage to each enemy in the staging area.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After Ered Luin Miner is discarded from the top of your deck, put it into play under your control.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Temple of the Deceived

property.name: Text
property.value: Setup: Prepare the Island Map (see insert). Flip over the top-left and bottom-left locations of the Island Map (without resolving their Forced effects, if any), and choose one as the players’ starting active location, using a resource token to represent which location is active. The first player takes control of Captain Sahír, and the last player takes control of Na’asiyah (objective-ally sides faceup). Add Temple Guardian to the staging area and attach Gate Key to it, guarded. Shuffle the encounter deck.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Temple of the Deceived

property.name: Text
property.value: Exploration. For each progress that would be placed on Searching the Island, you may place it on a location in the staging area, instead.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Temple of the Deceived

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Uncharted. Immune to player card effects.

property.name: Text
property.value: Travel: Exhaust the Gate Key to travel here. Forced: After Temple of the Deceived becomes the active location, flip it over.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Temple of the Deceived

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Immune to player card effects.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: When The Grotto’s Entrance is flipped over while active, put Temple Guardian into play from the victory display, engaged with the player with the highest threat. When the 8th progress is placed on The Grotto’s Entrance, the players have found the sunken ruins and win the game.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Temple of the Deceived

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Uncharted. Immune to player card effects.

property.name: Text
property.value: Travel: Exhaust the Gate Key to travel here. Forced: After Temple of the Deceived becomes the active location, flip it over.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Temple of the Deceived

property.name: Text
property.value: While Temple Halls is the active location, each character gets –1 Û and –1 Ú. Forced: When Temple Halls is flipped over while active, put Temple Guardian into play from the victory display, engaged with the player with the highest threat.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Temple of the Deceived

property.name: Keywords
property.value: X is the number of players in the game. Immune to player card effects. Cannot be optionally engaged.

property.name: Text
property.value: Temple Guardian gets –50 engagement cost while Cursed Temple is the active location.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Temple of the Deceived

property.name: Traits
property.value: Item. Artifact.

property.name: Text
property.value: If unattached, return Gate Key to the staging area and it gains: “Action: Exhaust a hero to claim Gate Key and attach it to that hero.” Action: Exhaust Gate Key and attached hero and spend 3 resources from attached hero’s resource pool to look at the facedown side of a Temple of the Deceived.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Temple of the Deceived

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Uncharted. Cannot have player card attachments.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: After Lost Island becomes the active location, flip it over. Action: Remove 4 progress from Lost Island to look at its facedown side.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Temple of the Deceived

property.name: Text
property.value: While Jagged Cliffs is the active location, the location to its right is not considered to be in the staging area. Forced: When Jagged Cliffs is flipped over while active, look at the facedown side of each adjacent copy of Lost Island.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Temple of the Deceived

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Uncharted. Cannot have player card attachments.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: After Lost Island becomes the active location, flip it over. Action: Remove 4 progress from Lost Island to look at its facedown side.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Temple of the Deceived

property.name: Text
property.value: While Winding Caverns is the active location, each enemy gets +10 engagement cost. When you would travel from Winding Caverns to another location, you may travel to a location up to 3 locations away. (You must still pay that location’s Travel cost in order to travel there.)

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Temple of the Deceived

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Uncharted. Cannot have player card attachments.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: After Lost Island becomes the active location, flip it over. Action: Remove 4 progress from Lost Island to look at its facedown side.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Temple of the Deceived

property.name: Text
property.value: While Jungle Path is the active location, the locations immediately above and below it are not considered to be in the staging area. Forced: When Jungle Path is flipped over while active, each player must exhaust a character with at least 2 Û.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Temple of the Deceived

property.name: Text
property.value: While engaged with a player, Faithless Desecrator contributes its $ to the total $ in the staging area.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û (+2 Û instead of the active location is a Ruins location).

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Temple of the Deceived

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Island Watcher cannot be optionally engaged.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Island Watcher is in the staging area, it gains: “Forced: At the beginning of the encounter phase, if the active location has the Ruins trait, Island Watcher engages the player with the highest threat. Then, deal it 2 shadow cards.”

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Temple of the Deceived

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: When you travel to the right, Profane Dead makes an immediate attack against the engaged player.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Temple of the Deceived

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Until the end of the phase, add X $ to the total $ in the staging area. X is the total $ of all locations to the left of the active location (in its row). If X is 0, Deeper into the Ruins gains Doomed 1.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Temple of the Deceived

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Each player must choose: raise his threat by the number of his characters committed to the quest, or deal 1 damage to each of his characters committed to the quest.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: If this attack destroys a character, raise your threat by the attacking enemy’s $.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Temple of the Deceived

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Each player must randomly discard cards from his hand until he has no more than 3 cards in his hand. If no cards were discarded by this effect, Dwindling Supplies gains doomed 2.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Defending character gets -2 Ú for this attack.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Temple of the Deceived

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Doomed 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Each Uncharted location in the staging area gets +1 $ until the end of the phase. If the active location has the Ruins trait, discard 1 resource from each hero and objective ally in play.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Temple of the Deceived
